Posts.Content: Hi all last week i was officially diagnosed with stage2 bc,her2 receptive,i am obviously devestated but coping,my question is can you fly after your first chemo sesh ? I had a trip ro spain planned for 5 days on the 10th of april this will be over 2 weeks after my first lot any advice please ? My oncologist said she wasnt worried about me flying but perhaps picking up an infection,what do you all think x
Posts.Title: chemo & travel
